thread.section_title: Perfect Visit Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Perfect Visit | perfectvisit.com
thread.title: Glenn

author: Glenn
title: Glenn
text:
I was being relocated twice in 4 months from Frankfurt to Amsterdam for work purposes. As I had several requests as location, space and connectivity I ran into issues sorting out a good fit myself. My colleague advised to contact Perfect Visit, and so I did. After 1 hour I received a proposal consisting out of 3 options that were according to my needs. I ended up booking the Pijp Boutique Apartment and enjoyed my stay there.
Overall a very good experience, good communication and good apartment.
